reviews.review:
Very fun with friends, still a good time when playing with randoms. 

I will say though, Killers who camp are the only downside to this game.

other than that, I very much enjoy this chaotic game :))
This game is fantastic! I get tunneled and face camped every game! would reccomend!
донатная помойка,с кучей багов,тупого токсичного комьюнити,с огромными проблемами с балансом,игру на которую забили hui..
Новая кара полное говно,на ней невозможно играть,ибо тебя сразу загенрашат.
Mto bom para jogar com os amigos de surv :D
i lost quite a few brain cells but the game is good
don't do this to yourself. bad game, survivor biased
It is a good game to play with friends and even by yourself killer is also very fun to play
So, after 350 ish hours of playing this game, it literally made me suicidal. Dont play, not worth a cent and not worth the time. Buy Fallout or something.
i really love this game so much so seggsy i love
fun changing until you reach high ranks then sometimes feels the same but you never know who you will go against

This game entitles me and makes me want to break my computer.
I have been playing it since the beginning when it was free for a short time, then when dlc 1 released i bought it and was playing every time a new chapter came out.
And its still annoying.



10/10
эта игра где только за тобой всю игру бегает убийца и в итоге ты умираешь первым.

Great game to play with friends and even more fun when characters from your favourite movies/games become available. I enjoy learning about all the perks and finding new and interesting builds for my survivors.
Fun and met some great friends.
Very fun game with friends, highly recommend.
Very fun game recommended to all people

the balance of this game is really not where me and many others would like it to be. Billy's overheat addition was uneeded and unwanted, as well as the last 5 killers (at the time of sadakos release) that have added nothing skill ceiling wise to the game. The meta is either hold W or get hit no matter what at pallets. Very boring imo
呜呜呜萌新被锤傻了，但是放我的麦叔简直太帅了！就是有点内疚他背我找了一路地窖，我却在看他的屁股嚎好翘！！！
The only horror game that can make me laugh
See what I like about this game is that one of the characters are actually Jewish, and the best part is that you can beat the shit out of em as a killer!
комьюнити в этой игре такое себе, хуже чем в кс. Но игра мне понравилась, буду в ней часто зависать)))
the feeling of getting chased by the killer especially kpop oppar <3 . doki doki !

คือกูไปใช้บั๊กตอนไหนว่ะเลยมาแบนกูยังสร้างห้องเล่นกันเองกับเพื่อนอยู่เลย
DLC Resident Evilตัวล่าสุดชื้อมาเล่นไม่คุ้มเลย
Came back for a little bit, got worse. Game isn't worth the money anymore.

This Is Not My First 1v4 Horror Game But It Is The Best

Gameplay (Killer And Surviver)- 7/10 (Can Get Boring After 30 Minutes To 1 Hour)
DLC's- 8/10 (I Only Have Play Most Of The DLC's On My Friends Steam Account And I Am Considering Buying Most If Not All Of Them. Overall The DLC's Add A New Experince To the For Both Killer And Surviver Mains)
Art Looks- 10/10 (One Of The Most Real-Looking Game Art Wise)
Achievements- 9/10 (Hard But Give The Player A Felling Of Reward And Dedacation To The Game)
Overall-9.5/10 (Should Get If you Have The Cash To Blow)
its a really fun game, only bad part is that you need to buy some of the better perks with the DLC packs. other than that, really good

This game is horrifying yet so good to play. Hard to control but I guess it takes time to get use to it. It got me addicted. Although, it took quite some time to find a match game. But I don't mind :)
对新手玩家不太友好，新手玩人类可能秒死，新手玩屠夫可能气死。
Es un buen juego para viciar
出不出去无所谓。主要是一家人要整整齐齐的。

[h1] Expectativa [/h1]
Um jogo que faz você trabalhar com 4 pessoas que nunca se viram na vida, unidos fazem os geradores para poderem fugir do assassino cruel e perigoso que está a solta no mapa. Com um excelente trabalho em equipe os sobreviventes consegue sair pela porta da liberdade e viram amigos para sempre, jogando juntos e felizes.

[h1] Realidade [/h1]
Ninguém liga para ninguém, primeira oportunidade de soltar a mão a pessoa já ta bem longe fazendo as malas para ir embora. Um jogo que na teoria era para ser 4 jogadores unidos na prática é bem diferente... Mas tirando isso o jogo é super legal, tem uma ideia muito boa e tira várias risadas e sustos [spoiler] as vezes dá uma vontade de morrer de ódio mas depois passa [/spoiler]
This game is a lot of fun! alone and with friends both! Strong recommendation.

The game itself was pretty fun months ago. But then they changed a lot of fun things inside the game, changed the matchmaking (that just need some tweaks, not a change) and not the big dynamite: NFT. I'm sorry but the company are killing their own game, not to say the planet too. I'm disgusted and disappointed.
Facecamping and Tunneling. Non rank exclusive. 10/10 Still play it tho

I think we can all agree NOED is a crutch perk for bad killers and survivors have too much second chance perks. but stop expecting them to "balance" this game because there are too many variables to change just one thing at a time so deal with what we got. Maybe you're just mad because you're bad.

been playing this game for years and to be honest its not fun but i've already invested so much time into it. its kind of like being in an abusive relationship you hope it gets better but you know it wont.
Я ПЛАЧУ ПОЧЕМУ ТАКИЕ ЛЮДИ ЖИВУТ НА ЗЕМЛЕ

This game ive been playing this for over 1000 hours now, on xbox, ps4 and now moving to pc, its had its ups and downs, the binding of kin and all kill chapters were examples of some of its downs. but this game is ultimately an amazing game with a lot of good content including the most recent when writing this the resident evil chapter, the developers commitment to making this game the best it can possibly be with making their own original characters like the blight and the oni and licensed characters such as Michael Myers and my personal favourite Freddy Krueger and not just implementing them perfectly inyo the fog but also giving every killer their own unique power and their own individual three teachable character perks. but i think they could do a bit more on the survivor side to make each character unique in their own way because they are just re-skinned versions of themselves
jogo lerdo, prefiro algo mais dinâmico, tipo L4D

Es alto juego, lo malo es el emparejamiento ya que te pueden tocar hasta rangos 1 siendo rango 18.
Sacando de lado eso el juego puede ser jugado con amigos o solo y aun asi te vas a divertir,
vale la pena comprarlo.
